title: Police: 11-year-old among victims in murder-suicide
content:
ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. (KRQE) – One of the victims of a murder-suicide this weekend is just 11-years-old.
Police say a family friend discovered the bodies of three family members Sunday morning at the Villa Hermosa Apartments near Coors and Quail. One of them was 11-year-old Nhi Nguyen.
Police say her stepfather, 45-year-old Tran Trinh Van, shot and killed her and his wife, 39-year-old Cam Thi To, then himself.
They say Van had a history of domestic violence and she had recently asked him to move out.
Albuquerque Public Schools says 11-year-old Nhi recently enrolled at S.R. Marmon Elementary.
